finetuned.fintune 1: Heat tomato and put on counter. At any time, put a mug with a spoon in it on the table. After heating the tomato, place a pot with a knife and a potato slice in it on a table. Lastly, warm up a plate in the microwave.
finetuned.fintune 2: Warm up a plate in the microwave. At any time, put a mug with a spoon in it on the table. After warming up the plate, place a heated egg on a table. Finally, heat tomato and put on the counter.
finetuned.fintune 3: Warm up a plate in the microwave. Simultaneously, put a mug with a spoon in it on the table. After warming up the plate, place a pot with a knife and a potato slice in it on a table. Finish by heating a tomato and putting it on the counter.
